The claim was fact: checked by Africa Check, an independent and non-partisan organization known for assessing claims made in the public arena.
The claim was rated as false by the fact: checker, indicating that there is no evidence to support the assertion that Patrice Motsepe offered Julius Malema R4 billion to quit politics.
The expert: s verdict also highlights that the content rated as false will be downgraded on Facebook and Instagram, resulting in fewer people seeing it, which indicates the potential consequences of spreading false information.
